lead_paragraph: English Premier League champions Leicester City have signed  German goalkeeper Ron-Robert Zieler from Hannover 96 for an undisclosed fee on a four-year contract, the club announced on their website on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Leicester City Sign Goalkeeper Zieler From Hannover 96
headline.main: Leicester City Sign Goalkeeper Zieler From Hannover 96

snippet: English Premier League champions Leicester City have signed  German goalkeeper Ron-Robert Zieler from Hannover 96 for an undisclosed fee on a four-year contract, the club announced on their website on Friday....
